name: MAMBA FURY BASKETBALL SHOE
description: Named for a raw emotion that defined Kobe Bryant's legendary game: the Nike Mamba Fury Basketball Shoe.

Lace-up closure
Padded collar and tongue for increased comfort
Tongue pull tab
Low-top design is sleek and lightweight, providing support without sacrificing agility
Nike Zoom Air cushioning under the ball of your foot helps deliver a burst of responsive energy generated by your own force
TPU heel clip
Durable rubber outsole
